data.title: Population Statistics, Maps, Charts, Weather and Web Information
data.meta_description: South Africa: Provinces and Major Urban Areas with population statistics, maps, charts, weather and web information.
data.text:
Contents: Urban Areas

The population of all South African urban areas with more than 15,000 inhabitants by census years.

The urban areas are aggregated from sub places that are completely or mostly urban according to the 2011 definition. The aggregation to "reasonable" urban areas was done by »City Population«.
